name: Hilltop Pharmacy
description: The pharmacy sits quiet on the hill. Route 30 stretches west into the distance.
storyNote: Tutorial - First stop after fleeing Philadelphia

scavengeAreas.name: Front Counter Area
scavengeAreas.description: The main counter and shelves near the entrance

scavengeAreas.name: Prescription Area
scavengeAreas.description: Behind the counter where prescriptions were filled

scavengeAreas.name: Back Storage Room
scavengeAreas.description: The storage area in the back - door is slightly ajar

name: Route 30 Strip Mall
description: Half the storefronts are burned out. The parking lot is a graveyard of abandoned cars, doors hanging open. This was someone's last stand.

scavengeAreas.name: Grocery Store
scavengeAreas.description: The main grocery - shelves toppled, but might have something

name: Willowbrook Elementary School
description: Crayon drawings still hang on classroom walls. Tiny desks lie overturned. The playground swings creak in the wind. The silence here is the loudest thing you've ever heard.

scavengeAreas.name: Nurse's Office
scavengeAreas.description: Small medical office with first aid supplies

name: Lancaster Town Limits
description: A small Pennsylvania town that tried to quarantine itself. Makeshift barricades block the main road. They didn't hold. The houses beyond are dark and still.
storyNote: Transition from suburbs to small towns

scavengeAreas.name: Nearest Houses
scavengeAreas.description: Row houses closest to the barricade

name: Route 76 Motor Lodge
description: The neon 'VACANCY' sign still flickers weakly. Most room doors have been kicked in. One doesn't show any signs of forced entry.

scavengeAreas.name: Office and Reception
scavengeAreas.description: Front desk area with keys and records

scavengeAreas.name: Ground Floor Rooms
scavengeAreas.description: Accessible motel rooms on ground level

scavengeAreas.name: Intact Room
scavengeAreas.description: The one room that wasn't forced open

name: Millbrook Police Station
description: A small-town station with reinforced doors. The armory entrance hangs open—someone got here first. But small towns always kept backup supplies.

scavengeAreas.name: Evidence Room
scavengeAreas.description: Locked evidence storage in the basement

name: Interstate Gas & Food
description: A truck stop where the highway meets mountain roads. The pumps are dry. The convenience store's back room might still have something.

scavengeAreas.name: Convenience Store
scavengeAreas.description: Front area with snacks and supplies

name: Tuscarora Ranger Station
description: Deep in state forest, a wooden ranger cabin overlooks dense trees. The rangers are long gone. Their supplies might not be.

scavengeAreas.name: Lookout Tower
scavengeAreas.description: Fire watch tower - ladder leads up

name: Abandoned Dairy Farm
description: An old farmhouse sits beside a collapsed barn. The livestock are gone. Rusted equipment litters the yard. The wind carries no sound but your own breathing.

scavengeAreas.name: Farmhouse Interior
scavengeAreas.description: Old family home with pantry and cellar

scavengeAreas.name: Grain Silo
scavengeAreas.description: Tall silo still standing - ladder inside

name: Eagle Rock Emergency Checkpoint
description: Military barricades and FEMA tents stretch across the highway. This was supposed to be salvation. But the checkpoint is silent. Abandoned. The evacuation already happened—or failed.
storyNote: Major story beat - failed checkpoint, route choice

scavengeAreas.name: Command Tent
scavengeAreas.description: Large military tent with radios and maps

name: Mountain Trail Cabin
description: A hunting cabin tucked deep in the forest. No roads lead here—just an overgrown trail. Isolated. Quiet. Maybe too quiet.

scavengeAreas.name: Cabin Interior
scavengeAreas.description: Single room with fireplace and supplies

name: Pinewood Lake Campground
description: Picnic tables and fire pits sit empty beside a still lake. The ranger office is locked. The boat dock has one canoe left.

scavengeAreas.name: Ranger Office
scavengeAreas.description: Small building with equipment and supplies

scavengeAreas.name: Boat Dock Storage
scavengeAreas.description: Shed near the water with fishing gear

name: Skyline Overlook
description: A scenic overlook at the mountain's peak. From here you can see for miles—smoke rising from distant towns. The road continues west. There's no turning back now.
storyNote: End of MVP demo - forest route

name: Route 80 Truck Stop Diner
description: A chrome-sided diner sits beside a fuel station. Truckers' last meals still sit on the counter. The jukebox is silent.
storyNote: Road route - more civilization, more danger

name: Interstate Truck Plaza
description: A massive truck stop with a convenience store, showers, and restaurant. Semi-trucks block the exits. Someone might still be here.

name: Susquehanna River Bridge
description: A long bridge spans the river. Military roadblocks at both ends. Abandoned supply trucks. The bridge is the only way across—and you're not the only one who knows it.
storyNote: End of MVP demo - road route
